hero.title: Accessible Professional Financial Management
hero.subtitle: Bridging the gap between high-end CA services and the everyday needs of small businesses, startups, and individuals. We take the financial burden off your shoulders, so you can focus on growing your business.

about.title: Welcome to ACCOUNTANTS POINT,
description: where we believe that professional financial management should be accessible to everyone. Our firm was founded on a simple yet powerful mission: to bridge the gap between high-end CA services and the everyday needs of small businesses, startups, and individuals.

We understand the challenges you face. The complexities of GST, the deadlines for TDS, and the annual stress of ITR filing can be overwhelming. Many businesses hesitate to hire a full-time accountant or invest in expensive software like Tally Prime, leading to unmanaged books and a lack of clarity on profits and financial health. This is where we step in.

ACCOUNTANTS POINT is your dedicated financial partner. We provide the same level of expertise, precision, and diligence you would expect from a top-tier CA firm, but at a fraction of the cost. Our team of experienced professionals is committed to taking the financial burden off your shoulders, allowing you to focus on what you do best: growing your business. We are not just your accountants; we are a cornerstone for your financial stability and growth.

services.subtitle: We offer a focused suite of services designed to keep your finances organized, compliant, and transparent. We handle the numbers, so you can see the clear picture of your business's success.

items.title: GST & TDS Compliance
items.description: Simplified & Stress-Free. Navigating the world of Goods and Services Tax (GST) and Tax Deducted at Source (TDS) can be a minefield of changing regulations and strict deadlines. Our experts ensure you are always 100% compliant, saving you from penalties and legal hassles.
features: GST Registration: Hassle-free registration for new businesses.
Monthly/Quarterly GST Filings: Accurate and timely filing of GSTR-1, GSTR-3B, and other required returns.
GST Reconciliation: Meticulous matching of your books with GST portal data to avoid discrepancies.
TDS Calculation & Filing: Precise calculation of TDS, timely deposit, and filing of quarterly TDS returns.
Advisory: Expert guidance on any GST or TDS related queries.

items.title: Income Tax Return (ITR) Filing
items.description: For Individuals & Businesses. Maximize your tax savings and ensure accurate reporting with our professional ITR filing services. We cater to salaried individuals, freelancers, and small business owners, making tax season a breeze.
features: Salaried Individuals: Helping you claim all eligible deductions and exemptions.
Business & Professional Income: Comprehensive ITR filing for proprietorships and small businesses.
Capital Gains & Other Sources: Expert handling of income from property, investments, and other sources.
Tax Planning: Proactive advice to help you legally minimize your tax liability throughout the year.

items.title: Expert Bookkeeping with Tally Prime
items.description: Your Virtual Accountant. This is our cornerstone service, designed for businesses that need professional accounting without the high cost of a full-time accountant or software licenses. You don't need to buy Tally or hire an accountantâ€”we become your dedicated accounting department.
features: No Software Purchase Needed: We use our licensed Tally Prime software to manage your books.
Accurate Data Entry: We handle all your sales, purchases, receipts, and payment entries with precision.
Bank Reconciliation: We ensure your bank statements perfectly match your books of accounts.
Financial Reports on Demand: Gain clear insights with reports like Profit & Loss, Balance Sheet, and more.

whyChooseUs.title: Affordable Expertise
whyChooseUs.description: Get access to CA-firm level knowledge and professionalism without the high price tag. We believe in fair pricing for top-quality service.

whyChooseUs.title: Your Growth Partner
whyChooseUs.description: We are invested in your success. By keeping your finances in order, we provide the stable foundation you need to grow your business.

whyChooseUs.title: Clarity & Control
whyChooseUs.description: Stop guessing about your profits. We provide you with clear, easy-to-understand reports that give you complete control over your financial destiny.

whyChooseUs.title: Peace of Mind
whyChooseUs.description: With us managing your compliance and bookkeeping, you can rest easy knowing that your financial obligations are handled correctly and on time.

contact.subtitle: Take the first step towards stress-free financial management. Whether you're a growing business in need of a reliable accounting partner or an individual looking for expert tax filing, Accountants Point is here to help.
contact.cta: Contact us today for a FREE initial consultation!
